DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate effectiveness l-leucovorin preventing toxicity high dose trimethoprim / sulfamethoxazole ( TMP / SMX ) use therapy Pneumocystis carinii pneumonia ( PCP ) patient AIDS .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Double-Blind , Placebo Controlled Study l-Leucovorin Combination With Trimethoprim / Sulfamethoxazole Therapy Pneumocystis Carinii Pneumonia Patients With Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must follow : Diagnosis PCP . Fit CDC definition AIDS . Be receive intravenous oral trimethoprim / sulfamethoxazole ( Bactrim , Septra ) dose = > 15mg/kg/day trimethoprim component . Be receive = < 48 hour trimethoprim / sulfamethoxazole ( TMP / SMX ) prior randomization . Must sign inform consent accordance FDA guideline . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow condition symptom exclude : Can take oral medication . Require continue administration anticonvulsant agent phenytoin , phenobarbital primidone . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Continued administration anticonvulsant agent phenytoin , phenobarbital primidone . Patients follow excluded : Can take oral medication . Require continue administration anticonvulsant agent phenytoin , phenobarbital primidone . Prior Medication : Excluded : > 48 hour trimethoprim / sulfamethoxazole prior randomization .
